00028 #ifndef TRANSLATION_PROFILE_H
00029 #define TRANSLATION_PROFILE_H
00030 
00031 #include <cstring>
00032 #include <string>
00033 //
00034 #if defined (WIN32)
00035 #else
00036 #include "sys/time.h"
00037 #endif
00038 
00039 #define PROFILE_BEGIN( _p ) \
00040   { \
00041     p.begin(); \
00042   }
00043 
00044 #define PROFILE_END_VERBOSE( _p, _level, _msg )                         \
00045   {                                                                     \
00046     _p.end();                                                           \
00047     Verbose::out(_level, ToStr(__FILE__ ) + ToStr(":") + ToStr(__LINE__) \
00048                  + ToStr(": ") +  ToStr(_msg) + ToStr(": ") +           \
00049                  p.getElapsedFormatedString() );                        \
00050   }
00051 
00052 /** Place to group program options. */
00053 class Profile
00054 {
00055 
00056 public:
00057 
00058   float   m_totalElapsedSeconds;
00059   int     m_totalCalls;
00060 #if defined (WIN32)
00061 #else
00062   timeval m_startTimeval;
00063   timeval m_endTimeval;
00064 #endif
00065   int     m_startCount;
00066   int     m_endCount;
00067 
00068   Profile() {
00069     m_totalCalls = 0;
00070     m_totalElapsedSeconds = 0.0;
00071     m_startCount = 0;
00072     m_endCount   = 0;
00073   }
00074 
00075   void          begin();
00076   void          checkTimes();
00077   void          end();
00078   float         getElapsedSeconds();
00079   std::string   getElapsedFormatedString();
00080 
00081 };
